name: Magnet Mania (bowlerk)
description:
Magnet Mania is a game developed in 2 weekends for the Free Lives Physics game jam 2021 for the student category.

Mess around with physics based magnets and grabbing in 2 modes. 

Time limited building where you try get as high up in 1 minute with the frantic results that entail. Or a sandbox where you can build at your own pace and mess with some structures. 

A tutorial is available from the How to Play section.
